form.label: Open Ports (tracked)
form.description: Recent search results combined with historic data from the discovered_open_ports lookup

search.query: | inputlookup discovered_open_ports.csv | stats count by entity
index="easm" sourcetype="easm:open_port" | stats count by port | sort - count | lookup port_to_service_lookup port | eval label=port." (".service.")"

`get_all_discovered_open_ports` | search port IN $portToken$ entity="$entityToken$" easm_hostname="$hostnameFilterToken$" | sort - last_seen | convert ctime(*seen) | lookup port_to_service_lookup port | table entity, ip, port, service, hostname, easm_hostname, last_seen, first_seen, port_scan_type | rename hostname as "hostname (from discovery)", easm_hostname as "hostname (queried)", service as "service (likely)"
